item.title: Bootstrapping SQL databases for local and production setup
item.description: A practical walkthrough of how I manage SQL databases across dev and prod - from local container setups to CI/CD-powered migrations in the cloud. Code and examples are available here: bootstrapping-databases Intro When working with databases, itâ€™s easy to fall into the trap of taking shortcuts - a quick container here, a few clicks in the AWS console there, and before you know it, you’re running production off an unversioned schema with the master user.
